Text: Just letting those of you who aren't aware, DO NOT INSTALL THE CRACKS until YOU HAVE UPDATED.

Can anyone teach me how to install the game step by step ? im portuguese and not very comfortable with english.. ive never downloaded a game before and im kind of lost...
thank you

Okay, firstly you'll need an ISO mounter; Google it and find a tutorial, I'm too lazy to write out all of the steps, becuase its quite a lot of steps. Mount each ISO, starting with the base game. Install all of them, then run all of the patches. Get the crack out of the ISO root and put it in your Sims 3 install directory. And voila.

It has the latest patches, yes. If you want to update from that version, (a la Town Life Stuff, out soon) then you will have to grab the updates from the official website or from elsewhere. From this update out, however, there is no need to update expansion; Updating the base game will suffice.

Spellbook isn't broken. Its even in another torrent of mine. Also, this version's updates WORK. I do not know what you experienced, perhaps trying to overwrite a crack caused the problem. If you install everything, update, then apply the cracks, you will be golden.
